snippet: Members of the American Israel Public Affairs Committee on Tuesday held a record 530 meetings with lawmakers, whom they urged to support tougher measures against Iran’s nuclear program.
abstract: Members of the American Israel Public Affairs Committee hold a record 530 meetings with lawmakers in a single day, urging them to support tougher measures against Iran’s nuclear program; attendance at AIPAC is essential for Congressmen of both parties attempting to establish their pro-Israel bona fides.
lead_paragraph: Members of the American Israel Public Affairs Committee on Tuesday held a record 530 meetings with lawmakers, whom they urged to support tougher measures against Iran’s nuclear program.

headline.seo: Pro-Israel Lobbyists Have Washington’s Ear on Iran
headline.main: Pro-Israel Delegates Have Washington’s Ear on Iran
headline.print_headline: Pro-Israel Delegates Have Washington’s Ear on Iran
